title: resources
text:

Mine’s quarto manuscripts

Hello!
Welcome to my personal (work in progress) site. I am a student enrolled in a Master of Science degree in Statistics and data science, specializing in biostatistics. I use R, SAS, and Python for statistical analysis and visualizations. Working on building an understanding of spatial statistics, infectious diseases modelling and computational statistics with C, C++.

education


MS in Biostatistics, 2020 - Ongoing|Hasselt University



BS in Applied Statistics, 2015|Maseno University





experience


Research Assistant, 2022-2023|Karolinska Institutet



Data Manager, 2022-2022|Kenya Medical Research Institute



Data Manager, 2018-2020|KEMRI - Wellcome Trust Research Programme
